channel.title: New laptop - Acer
channel.description:
Well my old laptop was slowly dieing so i got a new $500 acer laptop. I know its kinda cheap but my previous laptop was about 350.
But i was wondering if all the things about acer laptops breaking and stuff was true? And do they have any main problems?

item.title: New laptop - Acer
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

[quote=“casey., post:4, topic:226225”]Had my acer for almost a year, never broke.

I <3 it.[/quote]
So far i like mine, its great

item.title: New laptop - Acer
item.dc:creator: @runescape3dude runescape3dude
item.description:
@runescape3dude wrote:

xEnt:

One thing i dislike about laptops. They are more expensive than a desktop computer, and have less performance. If laptops were cheaper they’d be great. a 500$ one? whats that gonna get ya? a celeron 1ghz with 512mb ram and 20gb hdd? waste of money.

Computer don’t cost that much in NZ.
I got an 80GB Laptop HDD off trademe for $35. Brand new.
I also got a 512MB ram stick for $20.
Then you can get a laptop case and a mobo. Once you have those, all you need is a screen to plug into the back and a keyboard (if they weren’t already in the case).
There you go, a decent laptop for like $100

Read full topic
